text: avane bādhicca vipatt viṭṭeāḻiññaśēṣaṁ nam'muṭe anugrahaṁ nāmavane āsvadippiccāl tīrccayāyuṁ avan paṟayuṁ: "it enikk avakāśappeṭṭatutanneyāṇ. antyasamayaṁ āsannamākumenn ñān karutunnilla. athavā, ñānenṟe nāthanṟe aṭuttēkk tiriccayakkappeṭṭāluṁ enikk avanṟeyaṭutt nalla avasthayāṇuṇṭāvuka." ennāl ittaraṁ satyaniṣēdhikaḷkk avar pravartticcukeāṇṭirunnatineppaṟṟi nāṁ vivaramaṟiyikkuṁ. kaṭhinamāya śikṣa avare āsvadippikkuṁ
